TemplateField.description: Represents a single custom field within a template.

name.description: The name of the custom template field.

dataType.description: The data type of the custom template field.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the custom template field.

value.description: The value of the custom template field.

CreateTemplateDto.description: Data Transfer Object for creating a new template.

UpdateTemplateDto.description: Data Transfer Object for updating an existing template.

CreateTagDto.description: Data Transfer Object for creating a new tag.

entityTypes.description: The entity types of the tag.

UpdateTagDto.description: Data Transfer Object for updating an existing tag.

entityTypes.description: The entity types of the tag.

archived.description: The boolean flag to archive/unarchive a tag.

PaginatedQuery.description: Defines the query parameters for paginated API requests.

SharedStepItem.description: Represents a shared step item within a test case.

id.description: The unique identifier for the shared step item.

title.description:
The title of the shared step item.
Optional field that describes the name or label of the shared step.

description.description:
The description of the shared step item.
Optional field that provides additional details about the shared step.

expectedResult.description:
The expected result for the shared step item.
Optional field that outlines what the expected outcome of the shared step should be.

children.description:
A list of child shared step items.
This allows nested shared steps to be defined. Each child is a `SharedStepItem`.
Optional field that can be used to structure complex shared steps.

sharedStepUid.description:
The unique identifier for the shared step associated with this item.
Optional field to link this item to a specific shared step.

CreateSharedStepDto.description: Data Transfer Object for creating a new shared step.

name.description:
The name of the shared step.
This field defines the name or label for the shared step.

steps.description:
The list of steps for the shared step.
This is an array of `SharedStepItem` objects that define the individual steps
within the shared step. Each item can contain a title, description, expected result,
and optional child steps.

UpdateSharedStepDto.description: Data Transfer Object for updating an existing shared step.

name.description:
The name of the shared step.
Optional field that allows you to update the name or label of the shared step.

steps.description:
The list of steps for the shared step.
Optional field that allows you to update the steps within the shared step.
It is an array of `SharedStepItem` objects, where each item represents a step,
including its title, description, expected result, and optional child steps.

Record_string.any_.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

ListPlanQueryParams.description: Data Transfer Object for listing paginated plans.

statusUids.description:
list of statuses to filter by.
only plans with statuses here will be returned

priorityUids.description:
list of priorities to filter by.
only plans with the speficied priorities will be returned

tagUids.description: list of tags to filter by

milestoneUids.description: list of milestones to filter by

sets.description: a configuration set is a list of configuration options prefixed by their id

ConfigurationDTO.description: Defines the structure of the configuration for a plan.

Record_string.string_.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

CreatePlanDTO.description: Data Transfer Object for creating a new plan.

name.description:
The name of the plan.
This field defines the name or title of the plan.

description.description:
A brief description of the plan.
Optional field that provides additional context or information about the plan.

milestoneUids.description:
The milestone UIDs associated with the plan.
Optional field that links the plan to one or more milestones. Milestones represent significant points in the project or timeline.

status.description:
The status of the plan.
Optional field that defines the current state of the plan, such as pending, active, or completed, usually represented as a numeric value.

priority.description:
The priority level of the plan.
Optional field that represents the priority of the plan, typically represented as a numeric value (e.g., 1 = high, 2 = medium, 3 = low).

customFields.description:
Custom fields associated with the plan.
Optional field that allows the addition of key-value pairs to capture additional metadata or context for the plan.

externalId.description:
The external identifier for the plan.
Optional field to reference the plan externally, useful for integration with other systems or tools.

source.description:
The source of the plan.
Optional field that provides information about the origin of the plan, such as the tool or platform from which it was created.

testRuns.description:
The test runs associated with the plan.
Optional field that contains the test runs to be included in the plan, each with its UID and configuration details.

configuration.description:
The configuration details for the plan.
Optional field that specifies the configuration for the plan, such as the type of configuration and the sets of options it includes.

tagUids.description:
The tag UIDs associated with the plan.
Optional field to specify the tags linked to the plan. Tags help categorize or label the plan for better organization and filtering.

UpdatePlanDTO.description: Data Transfer Object for updating an existing plan.

name.description:
The name of the plan.
Optional field to update the name or title of the plan.

description.description:
A brief description of the plan.
Optional field to update the description, providing additional context or details about the plan.

tagUids.description:
The tag UIDs associated with the plan.
Optional field to update the tags linked to the plan. Tags help categorize or label the plan for easier organization.

milestoneUids.description:
The milestone UIDs associated with the plan.
Optional field to update the milestones linked to the plan. Milestones represent key points in the project or timeline.

runUids.description:
The run UIDs associated with the plan.
Optional field to update the test runs included in the plan. These are the specific runs that are part of the plan's execution.

status.description:
The status of the plan.
Optional field to update the current state of the plan, such as pending, active, or completed, typically represented by a numeric value.

priority.description:
The priority level of the plan.
Optional field to update the priority of the plan, generally represented as a numeric value (e.g., 1 = high, 2 = medium, 3 = low).

CreateMilestoneDTO.description: Data Transfer Object for creating a new milestone.

name.description:
The name of the milestone.
A string representing the title or label of the milestone.

description.description:
The description of the milestone.
Optional field that provides additional details or context about the milestone.

startDate.description:
The start date of the milestone.
A string in ISO 8601 format representing the start date of the milestone (e.g., "2025-03-01T00:00:00Z").

dueAt.description:
The due date of the milestone.
A string in ISO 8601 format representing the due date or deadline for the milestone (e.g., "2025-04-01T00:00:00Z").

status.description:
The status of the milestone.
A number representing the current status of the milestone (e.g., 1 for "In Progress", 2 for "Completed").

planIds.description:
The IDs of the plans associated with the milestone.
An array of numbers representing the IDs of the plans linked to the milestone.

runIds.description:
The IDs of the runs associated with the milestone.
An array of numbers representing the IDs of the test runs linked to the milestone.

tagUids.description:
The tag UIDs associated with the milestone.
Optional field to specify an array of tag IDs for categorizing or labeling the milestone.

name.description:
The name of the milestone.
A string representing the title or label of the milestone.

description.description:
The description of the milestone.
Optional field that provides additional details or context about the milestone.

startDate.description:
The start date of the milestone.
A string in ISO 8601 format representing the start date of the milestone (e.g., "2025-03-01T00:00:00Z").

dueAt.description:
The due date of the milestone.
A string in ISO 8601 format representing the due date or deadline for the milestone (e.g., "2025-04-01T00:00:00Z").

status.description:
The status of the milestone.
A number representing the current status of the milestone (e.g., 1 for "In Progress", 2 for "Completed").

planIds.description:
The IDs of the plans associated with the milestone.
An array of numbers representing the IDs of the plans linked to the milestone.

runIds.description:
The IDs of the runs associated with the milestone.
An array of numbers representing the IDs of the test runs linked to the milestone.

tagUids.description:
The tag UIDs associated with the milestone.
Optional field to specify an array of tag IDs for categorizing or labeling the milestone.

CreateFolderDto.description: [External API] Data Transfer Object for creating a new folder.

name.description:
The name of the folder.
A string representing the title or label of the folder.

externalId.description:
The external ID of the folder.
Optional field to associate the folder with an external identifier, such as from another system or service.

source.description:
The source of the folder.
Optional field to specify the origin or source system of the folder (e.g., "manual", "imported").

customFields.description:
The custom fields associated with the folder.
Optional field that allows additional metadata or custom attributes to be stored in the folder.

parentId.description:
The parent ID of the folder.
A number representing the unique identifier of the parent folder. Used for nesting folders.

UpdateFolderDto.description: Data Transfer Object for updating an existing folder.

name.description:
The name of the folder.
Optional field to update the title or label of the folder.

externalId.description:
The external ID of the folder.
Optional field to update the external identifier of the folder.

source.description:
The source of the folder.
Optional field to update the source or origin of the folder.

customFields.description:
The custom fields associated with the folder.
Optional field to update or add additional metadata or custom attributes to the folder.

parentId.description:
The parent ID of the folder.
Optional field to update the unique identifier of the parent folder, allowing for reorganization of folders.

status.description:
The status of the folder.
Optional field to update the current status of the folder.

ExecutionStep.description: Represents a step within an execution.

testStepUid.description:
The unique identifier for the test step.
Required field to specify the UID of the test step.

description.description:
The description of the test step.
Required field to describe the test step's action or purpose.

customFields.description:
The custom fields for the test step.
Required field to store custom information for the test step in a key-value format.

CreateExecutionDTO.description: Data Transfer Object for creating a new execution.

externalId.description:
The external identifier for the execution.
Optional field to specify an external ID for the execution.

source.description:
The source of the execution.
Optional field to specify the source of the execution (e.g., "manual", "automated").

testCaseUid.description:
The unique identifier of the associated test case.
Optional field to link the execution to a specific test case.

testCaseRef.description:
The reference number for the associated test case.
Optional field to provide an reference number for the test case.

testRunUid.description:
The unique identifier of the associated test run.
Optional field to link the execution to a specific test run.

status.description:
The status of the execution.
Optional field to specify the status of the execution (e.g., "not started", "in progress", "completed").

customFields.description:
The custom fields for the execution.
Required field to store custom information for the execution in a key-value format.

steps.description:
The steps associated with the execution.
Optional field to include the steps involved in the execution.

description.description:
The description of the shared step item.
Optional field that provides additional details about the shared step.

sharedStepUid.description:
The unique identifier for the shared step associated with this item.
Optional field to link this item to a specific shared step.

title.description:
The title of the shared step item.
Optional field that describes the name or label of the shared step.

expectedResult.description:
The expected result for the shared step item.
Optional field that outlines what the expected outcome of the shared step should be.

Pick_TestCaseStepItem.Exclude_keyofTestC.description: From T, pick a set of properties whose keys are in the union K

description.description:
The description of the shared step item.
Optional field that provides additional details about the shared step.

sharedStepUid.description:
The unique identifier for the shared step associated with this item.
Optional field to link this item to a specific shared step.

title.description:
The title of the shared step item.
Optional field that describes the name or label of the shared step.

expectedResult.description:
The expected result for the shared step item.
Optional field that outlines what the expected outcome of the shared step should be.

uid.description: optional uid, if sent, it means the step is to be updated. If not sent, it means a new step is to be added

position.description: position of the step when ordering the steps

UpdateExecutionDTO.description: Data Transfer Object for updating an existing execution.

status.description:
The status of the execution.
Optional field to specify the status of the execution.

priority.description:
The priority of the execution.
Optional field to set the priority level of the execution (e.g., high, medium, low).

dueAt.description:
The due date of the execution.
Optional field to set the due date for the execution in ISO 8601 format (e.g., "2025-03-10T12:00:00").

assignedTo.description:
The user assigned to the execution.
Optional field to specify the user responsible for the execution.

tagUids.description:
The tag UIDs associated with the execution.
Optional field to associate tags with the execution, represented by their unique identifiers.

tagReplacements.description:
The tag replacements for the execution.
Optional field to replace existing tags with new ones.
`existingTagUids` is an array of existing tags to be replaced, and `newTagUids` is an array of the new tags.

name.description:
The name of the execution.
Optional field to update the name or title of the execution.

steps.description:
The steps associated with the execution.
Optional field to update or add new steps for the execution.

templateFields.description:
The template fields for the execution.
Optional field to update or specify template fields associated with the execution.

CreateCustomFieldDto.description: Data Transfer Object for creating a new custom field.

name.description:
The name of the custom field.
A string representing the title or label of the custom field.

type.description:
The type of the custom field.
Optional field to specify the data type of the custom field (e.g., text, number, date).
Defaults to `undefined` if not provided.

source.description:
The source of the custom field.
Optional field to specify the origin or source of the custom field (e.g., "manual", "imported").

options.description:
The options for the custom field.
Optional field to define the available choices for the custom field, applicable for certain types like dropdowns or radio buttons.
Should be an array of strings representing the options.

UpdateCustomFieldDto.description: Data Transfer Object for updating an existing custom field.

name.description:
The name of the custom field.
Optional field to update the title or label of the custom field.

type.description:
The type of the custom field.
Optional field to update the data type of the custom field (e.g., text, number, date).

source.description:
The source of the custom field.
Optional field to update the source or origin of the custom field.

options.description:
The options for the custom field.
Optional field to update or add new options for the custom field.
Should be an array of strings representing the updated options.

CreateCaseDTO.description: Data Transfer Object for creating a new case.

customFields.description:
Custom fields associated with the case.
This is an object that contains custom fields relevant to the case. The structure can vary depending on the specific custom fields for the case.

source.description:
The source from which the case originates.
A string that represents the origin or the system from which the case is being created.

name.description:
The name of the case.
A string that provides the title or label for the case.

priority.description:
The priority of the case.
Optional field to define the importance or urgency of the case. It can be represented numerically (e.g., 1 = high priority).

repoUID.description:
The repository UID where the case is located.
A string that uniquely identifies the repository to which the case belongs.

parentId.description:
The parent case ID.
A number that represents the ID of the parent case, allowing the case to be part of a hierarchy or grouping.

steps.description:
The steps associated with the case.
An array of steps that describe the process, actions, or workflow related to the case.

externalId.description:
The external ID of the case.
A string that represents an external identifier, often used to correlate or link the case with external systems or databases.

projectId.description:
The project ID to which the case belongs.
A string that identifies the project that the case is part of.

templateId.description:
The template ID associated with the case.
Optional field to specify a template to be applied to the case. It links the case to a predefined template for consistency in its structure.

tagIds.description:
The tag IDs associated with the case.
Optional field that includes an array of tag IDs to categorize or label the case for better filtering or grouping.

tags.description: list of tag names to be attached to the case, typically used when importing tags
